pr_title: column ios_certificate length in app_info table not sufficient

timeline.message: increased ios_cerficate column size to accomodate ios's base64 encoded pem file

timeline.bodyText: this is too long, what is an expected size for the ios certificate?
timeline.author: zohrehj
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -44,7 +44,7 @@ CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `app_info` (
   `from_email_id` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
   `from_email_password` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
   `ios_bundle_id` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
-  `ios_certificate` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
+  `ios_certificate` varchar(7000) DEFAULT NULL,

replies.bodyText: this column contains Base64 encoded value of .pem file , hence it depends on the pem file . With this value only it allowed to update ios certificate value when we tested locally.
replies.author: aswinijena100

replies.bodyText:
that does not answer my question.
What is the length of the certificate you are currently using?
replies.author: zohrehj

replies.bodyText:
also, PEM is already base64 encoded.
https://support.quovadisglobal.com/kb/a37/what-is-pem-format.aspx
replies.author: zohrehj

timeline.message: changed the data type to text
changed the data type to TEXT for long text
